text: He (the king) said (to the women), “What was your affair when you sought Joseph to yield himself (to you)?” They said, “Glory be to God above all ! we did not know (find) any evil on his part.” The Aziz’s wife said, “Now the truth is manifest, I sought him to yield himself (to me) and he is certainly of those who are truthful.” said, “Now the truth is manifest, I sought him to yield himself (to me) and he is certainly of those who are truthful.”
